SourceText: Would you like to go back to the previous messages?
text: Adakah anda ingin kembali ke mesej sebelumnya?

SourceText: That's okay. Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines.
text: Tidak mengapa. Taip {HELP} pada bila-bila masa jika anda mahu butiran perkhidmatan kecemasan atau talian penting yang lain.

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
text: Maaf, saya tidak faham apa yang anda maksudkan.

SourceText: Here are the contact details of your local emergency services:
text: Berikut ialah butiran hubungan perkhidmatan kecemasan tempatan anda:

SourceText: Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines. Remember everything you say will be completely private!
text: Taip {HELP} pada bila-bila masa jika anda memerlukan butiran perkhidmatan kecemasan atau talian penting yang lain. Ingat bahawa semua yang anda nyatakan adalah sulit!

SourceText: If you ever feel like talking privately to a trained professional, you can call:
text: Sekiranya anda ingin bercakap secara peribadi dengan profesional terlatih, anda boleh menghubungi:

SourceText: Here are the contact details of your local medical services:
text: Berikut ialah maklumat hubungan perkhidmatan perubatan tempatan anda:

SourceText: Are you currently facing an emergency?
Do you need some support with an emotional issue?
text: Adakah anda memerlukan sokongan untuk mengatasi masalah emosi?

SourceText: Are you currently experiencing a health issue?
text: Adakah anda sedang mengalami masalah kesihatan?

SourceText: Are you experiencing an unsafe situation?
text: Adakah anda mengalami situasi tidak selamat?

SourceText: Do you need some urgent help?
It looks like you are facing an emergency. Can you please tell us what kind of assistance you need?
text: Anda kelihatan seperti sedang berada dalam kecemasan. Bolehkah anda beritahu kami jenis pertolongan yang anda perlukan?

SourceText: What would you like to do?
We hope this was helpful! You can access this information at any time by typing {HELP}.
text: Kami berharap ini dapat membantu anda! Anda boleh mengakses semula maklumat ini pada bila-bila masa dengan menaip {HELP}.

SourceText: Please type {MENU} to access resources and review completed modules, {PLAY} to receive a playful activity you can complete with your child, or {HELP} to access local support resources for a crisis.
text: Sila taip {MENU} untuk mengakses sumber dan semak semula kemahiran yang telah lengkap, {PLAY} untuk menerima aktiviti ceria yang anda boleh selesaikan bersama anak anda, atau {HELP} untuk mendapatkan bantuan sokongan tempatan bagi menghadapi krisis.

SourceText: You have not given consent to participate in this programme. Would you like to participate?
text: Anda masih belum memberi persetujuan untuk menyertai program ini. Adakah anda ingin turut serta?

SourceText: If you ever decide to participate in the programme, type HELLO.
text: Taip HELO jika anda ingin kembali untuk menyertai program ini.

SourceText: We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
Parenting is hard. ParentText may help. You've completed @fields.n_goals_completed out of @fields.n_goals_prog parenting goals. Would you like to continue your progress?
text: Saya faham, memang sukar untuk menjadi ibu bapa yang hebat. NKText mungkin boleh membantu anda. Anda telah melengkapkan @fields.n_goals_completed daripada matlamat keibubapaan @fields.n_goals_prog. Adakah anda ingin meneruskan kemajuan anda?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: That's okay. If you ever decide to come back, type HELLO.
text: Tidak mengapa. Taip HELO jika anda membuat keputusan untuk kembali.

SourceText: You are already part of ParentText!
Staying in ParentText helps you and your child. Are you sure you want to exit the programme?
text: Jika anda kekal berada dalam NKText, saya boleh membantu anda dan anak anda. Adakah anda pasti ingin keluar daripada program ini?

SourceText: If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type "EXIT".
text: Sila taip "KELUAR" sekiranya anda tidak lagi mahu menerima sebarang mesej.

SourceText: If you made a mistake, please type "BACK".
text: Sila taip "KEMBALI" jika anda telah melakukan kesilapan.

SourceText: Thank you for participating. If you want to return to the programme, type HELLO.
text: Terima kasih kerana mengambil bahagian. Taip HELO jika anda mahu kembali ke program.

SourceText: We hope to see you again soon!
text: Kami harap dapat berjumpa anda lagi tidak lama lagi!

SourceText: We are so glad you want to stick around! We will resume your progress tomorrow.
text: Kami sangat gembira kerana anda ingin terus bersama kami! Kita akan sambung semula kemajuan anda esok.

SourceText: Your parent ID is @fields.research_id. Please share this ID with your facilitator.
text: ID ibu bapa anda ialah @fields.research_id. Sila kongsi ID ini dengan fasilitator anda.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: This feature will be available once you have completed registration. It won’t take long. Please continue your progress!
text: Selepas anda melengkapkan pendaftaran, ciri ini akan sedia ada untuk anda. Ia tidak akan mengambil masa yang lama. Sila teruskan dengan pendaftaran!

SourceText: The menu will be available once you have completed registration. It won’t take long. Please continue your progress!
text: Selepas anda melengkapkan pendaftaran, menu akan sedia ada untuk anda. Ia tidak akan mengambil masa yang lama. Sila maju!

SourceText: Thank you for taking a pause with me today.
text: Terima kasih kerana berhenti seketika bersama saya pada hari ini.

note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument
